channel.title: Need some Help with my Server!
channel.description: I recently found out that my computer is unable to port forward. Which sucks. However, I still have an amazing source! I have a kick, ban and IP Ban command.. However, my IP Ban only bans one's user. I was curious if anyone can help me create a working IP Ban command? Yes, I'm noob.. ALSO - On a side note if anyone can help me make 'Frost Scape' appear at the top of my server, while In-Game, thatd be good.. Other than that, yes. - I need help making a working IP Ban command. :(

item.title: Need some Help with my Server!
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

Not to put you down, but it seems a mute and ip ban is the LEAST of your worries atm ;).

Put the commands with your other commands. you say you have a “Ban command” just add those commands under that. Search in client.java ifcommand.equals That’s a command. go to the end of that command you’ll see a } go under that, add your new command. Can’t put it more seriously, i’m not writing a tut on how to add a command…

Read full topic
item.source: Need some Help with my Server!

item.title: Need some Help with my Server!
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

What?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2007, 09:34:17 PM[/size][hr]Ughghhh, look - Make like a mini tutorial for me on how to make a working 48 hour mute command and a working IP Ban command… Tell me which file and where abouts in that file I should put it in.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2007, 09:44:23 PM[/size][hr]ugh, none of these work! If SOMEONE can help me get a WORKING IP Ban and 48 Hour Mute command, PLEASE Post a mini-tut here, on exactly what to open, what to search, what to copy and paste, and where!

Read full topic

item.source: Need some Help with my Server!

item.title: Need some Help with my Server!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.startsWith("mute") && playerRights >= 1) { String otherguysname = command.substring(6); int index = playerHandler.getPlayerID(otherguysname); if(index != -1) { client guy = (client) server.PlayerHandler.players[index]; guy.mutedate = guy.GetLastLogin; sendMessage("You have muted "+guy.playerName+" for 48 hours."); guy.sendMessage("You have been muted by "+playerName+" for 48 hours."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Need some Help with my Server!

item.title: Need some Help with my Server!
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:162680”]if(command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights >= 3) { String otherguysname = command.substring(6); int index = playerHandler.getPlayerID(otherguysname); client guy = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index]; if(index != -1) { appendToBannedIP(guy.connectedFrom); sendMessage("You have IP banned "+guy.playerName+"."); } }

If you want, I could make a mute command too.
I’m bored right now, lol.[/quote]

Make me a mute command :P. If it’s possible maybe make it so that i can choose how many days or hours the person is muted for, like; “::mute 1” for a day, or “::mute 01” for one hour? I don’t know if that’s possible, but I thought I’d ask :).

Edit: I forgot, PLEASE :P.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some Help with my Server!

item.title: Need some Help with my Server!
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

Yes, please do! A 48 hour mute command - And also help me make like, my server name appear up the top of the server.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2007, 09:28:48 PM[/size][hr]And where exactly do I put that command… And do I just copy + Paste it into client.java? Im so noob at this, lmao…

Read full topic
item.source: Need some Help with my Server!

item.title: Need some Help with my Server!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights >= 3) { String otherguysname = command.substring(6); int index = playerHandler.getPlayerID(otherguysname); if(index != -1) { client guy = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index]; appendToBannedIP(guy.connectedFrom); sendMessage("You have IP banned "+guy.playerName+"."); } }

If you want, I could make a mute command too.
I’m bored right now, lol.

Read full topic
